timeline.bodyText:
Since we flip the ordering of the widget, the component ultimately returns 'key:value' as string. To give an example,

User configures the widget. Selects 'column1' from the input schema
In the pivot textbox enters v1, v2, v3
On change the component sets the value as v1,v2,v3:column1.

If we are flipping the ordering of the component we should handle the onchange as well if we expect the value to be in the same ordering, in this case column1:v1, v2, v3
